name: Meow-Jong
description:
Meow-Jong is a modern take on the classic puzzle game Mahjong Solitaire, but with cats!

Pounce into this Feline Frenzy! Meow-Jong is the purrrrrrrfect game for children and adults alike. It's a CAT-tastic way to spend your day!

Packed with over 100 boards!


Useful feline abilities!
  • Stuck? Use your sharp eyes for move hints
  • Don't see a move? Swipe your paw to reshuffle the board
  • or backtrack to Undo your last moves

Test your skills!
  • Use your cat-like reflexes to 3-star every board!
